Estimate Project

Arcus

Description

Arcus is a browser based, user interface into the powerful Dispatch system. Arcus is ideal for distributed call center operations, and allows primary functions including call taking and dispatching, vehicle tracking and account/driver/vehicle administration.

Optional features include basic cashiering, SMS text notifications to passengers, as well as automated or driver initiated call outs.

Arcus Administration was developed as a part of the Arcus Enterprise Project, but it also can be used separately. Arcus Administration allows authorized personnel to manage operator, driver and vehicle profiles. Configurable parameters allow you to tailor Arcus to your business processes.

Back Office Module

The optional Arcus Back Office module provides convenient access to driver transactions, account usage, and other valuable data related to cashiering & billing. It interfaces seamlessly with payment gateways to consolidate transaction information within a single database.

Arcus Dispatch was developed as a part of the Arcus Enterprise Project, but it is also used separately.

Call taking and dispatching, vehicle tracking and account/driver/vehicle administration.

Arcus Administration allows authorized personnel to manage operator, driver and vehicle profiles. Configurable parameters allow you to tailor Arcus to your business processes.

Messaging & Notification System

Arcus Messaging & Notifications links to Twilio and other supported APIs to facilitate outbound SMS notifications to passengers and drivers, inbound SMS for text bookings, and outbound callout to alert passengers when their vehicle has arrived.
